name: S*M*A*S*H
description: '''Smash''' (normally typeset as '''S*M*A*S*H''') are an English [[punk rock]] [[trio (music)|trio]], who enjoyed brief notoriety in the early 1990s in the [[United Kingdom|UK]]. S*M*A*S*H was formed by Ed Borrie ([[human voice|vocals]], [[guitar]]), Salvatore Alessi (credited as Salv) ([[bass guitar|bass]]), and Rob Hague ([[drum]]s) in [[Welwyn Garden City]] in [[Hertfordshire]], [[England]].
